title: The Gilmore Girls 'house' is ready for visitors this holiday season
text:
Take a trip to Stars Hollow, Connecticut, via the Warner Bros. backlot in Hollywood this holiday season.

From Dec. 21, 2019 through Jan. 5, 2020, Studio Tour guests will be transported to the TV town and can visit original sets such as Luke's Diner, Stars Hollow High School, the gazebo and Lorelai's house.

Explore the town square and sip hot coffee, then snap a picture in front of the iconic gazebo to capture the perfect Gilmore moment.

The exterior of Luke's Diner will be dressed as seen in the show and the exterior sets of Lorelai's and Sookie's homes will be decorated for the holidays.

At the Gilmore residence, authentic props including Lorelai's 1999 Jeep Wrangler and mailbox will be on display. Inside the house, original costumes worn by Lorelai, Rory and Luke will be exhibited.

Food for purchase are all of Lorelai's favorite eats including pizza, hot dogs, Pop Tarts and coffee.
description: From Dec. 21, 2019 through Jan. 5, 2020, Studio Tour guests will be transported to the TV town of Stars Hollow, Connecticut.
